mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT issue.id as issue_id, issue.title as issue_title, issue.content as issue_content, issue.is_open as issue_is_open, issue.create_at as issue_create_at, author.id as author_id, author.nickname as author_nickname, author.profile_image_url as author_profile_image_url, milestone.id as milestone_id, milestone.title as milestone_title, milestone.progress as milestone_progress, label.id as label_id, label.title as label_title, label.color as label_color, label.description as label_description, member.id as assignees_id, member.nickname as assignees_nickname, member.profile_image_url as assignees_profile_image_url, issue_comment.id as issue_comment_id, issue_comment.content as issue_comment_content, issue_comment.create_at as issue_comment_create_at, issue_comment_author.id as issue_comment_author_id, issue_comment_author.nickname as issue_comment_author_nickname, issue_comment_author.profile_image_url as issue_comment_author_profile_image_url FROM issue INNER JOIN member author ON author.id = issue.author_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT milestone.id, milestone.title, milestone.is_deleted, (SUM(issue.is_open = 0) / COUNT(issue.id) * 100) AS progress FROM milestone INNER JOIN issue ON issue.milestone_id = milestone.id GROUP BY milestone.id, milestone.title) as milestone ON issue.milestone_id = milestone.id AND milestone.is_deleted = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN assigned_label ON issue.id = assigned_label.issue_id LEFT OUTER JOIN label ON assigned_label.label_id = label.id AND label.is_deleted = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN assignee ON issue.id = assignee.issue_id LEFT OUTER JOIN member ON assignee.member_id = member.id LEFT OUTER JOIN issue_comment ON issue.id = issue_comment.issue_id LEFT OUTER JOIN member issue_comment_author ON issue_comment.author_id = issue_comment_author.id AND issue_comment.is_deleted = 0 WHERE issue.is_deleted = 0 AND issue.id = #{id} ORDER BY issue.id desc, label.id, issue_comment.id, member.id
